name: Hilton Singapore Orchard
detail: Modern 5-star stay right on Orchard Road (formerly Mandarin Orchard).

name: InterContinental Singapore
detail: Heritage-meets-luxury 5-star hotel in Bugis for shopping + culture access.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Singapore
detail: Iconic 5-star Marina Bay hotel with skyline views and top-tier service.

name: The Fullerton Hotel Singapore
detail: Grand riverside 5-star heritage landmark in the CBD area.

name: Shangri-La Singapore
detail: Garden sanctuary 5-star resort-style hotel near Orchard/Tanglin.

name: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road
detail: Modern, tech-forward 4-star hotel with compact rooms and a rooftop pool along Orchard Road.

name: JEN Singapore Orchardgateway by Shangri-La
detail: Stylish 4-star hotel directly above Orchard Gateway MRT with skyline rooftop pool.

name: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
detail: Classic 4-star Orchard hotel with spacious rooms, popular for long stays and business travellers.

name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
detail: Reliable 4-star international hotel offering comfort, dining, and easy access to Orchard shopping.

name: Concorde Hotel Singapore
detail: Established 4-star hotel near Orchard Road with large rooms and a traditional business-hotel feel.
